#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
        long t;
        long i,b,c,d,e,solution;
        long n;
        scanf("%ld",&t);
        while(t-->0)
        {
                scanf("%ld",&n);
                if(n<=100)
                {
                        i=4*n;
                        if(n<3)
                                solution=(((i)*(i-1)*(i-2))/6);
                        else
                                solution=(((i)*(i-1)*(i-2))/6)-((4*n*(n-1)*(n-2))/6);
                        printf("%ld\n",solution);
                }
        }
        return 0;
}
